column1: Rosenda Monteros  (31 August 1935 – 29 December 2018) was a Mexican actress. She was born Rosa Méndez Leza in Veracruz and studied drama under Seki Sano. To American audiences
column2: she is best known for her role as Petra in The Magnificent Seven. She had a prolific film career north and south of the U.S.–Mexican border.From 1955 to 1957
column3: she was married to director Julio Bracho.
